site.name: Learning Tree Edusolutions
site.tagline: Striving towards excellence in Commerce Education
site.heroTitle: Objective Type Questions that prepare students for Boards, CUET & Olympiads
site.heroSubtitle: Curated by experienced Business Studies educators, aligned with the latest CBSE guidelines and designed for high-stakes exams.
heroHighlights: Perfect for CBSE Class XII, CUET, Olympiads & competitive exams

paragraphs: Learning Tree Edusolutions brings together Principals, Vice Principals, Heads of Departments, Educators, Academicians, experienced Business Studies and Accountancy school teachers, and CBSE Paper Setters to develop focused and high-quality resources for senior secondary school students.

Through our flagship series, we are committed to publishing comprehensive books in Business Studies and Accountancy aligned with various examinations. At present, our publications include Objective Type Questions in Business Studies (Class XII) and Textbook on Business Studies (Class XII), published by Goyal Brothers Prakashan.

We work closely with experienced school teachers and subject experts from schools of high repute to ensure that our content remains practical, classroom-tested, student-friendly, and up-to-date with the latest guidelines of respective academic bodies.

author.name: R. K. Mahajan
author.note: Best wishes for your academic and competitive success. With the right practice, every student can feel confident answering objective type questions.

books.subtitle: Books you can directly buy from Amazon or your preferred marketplace.

items.title: Objective Type Questions on Business Studies – Class XII
description: Why buy multiple books when one comprehensive guide can serve all your needs?
This book is thoughtfully designed to support your CBSE Board examination preparation and also serves as a valuable resource for CUET, Olympiads and other competitive exams.
bullets: NCERT-based: aligned with NCERT text, phrases and vocabulary for seamless understanding.
Expert authors: prepared by experienced Business Studies authors and reviewers with decades of classroom experience.
Tailored content: includes deleted topics list for CBSE students and additional content for CUET aspirants.
Extensive practice: 3000+ practice questions in MCQs, case-based MCQs, assertion–reason, statement correction, true/false, fill in the blanks and one-word/one-sentence answer formats.
contributors: Ms Akanksha Garg, Vishwa Bharti Public School, Noida (U.P.)
Ms Mridula Chawla, Shiv Vani Model School, Dwarka, New Delhi
Ms Parul Jain, Navy Children School, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi
Ms Priyanka Jain, HOD Commerce, Amity International School, Gurugram, Haryana
Ms Rashmi Kaul, HOD Commerce, Kothari International School, Noida, U.P.
Mr Sameer Bhatia, Maxfort School, Rohini, New Delhi
Ms Sumathy Raghunath, HOD Commerce, Cambridge School, Noida, U.P.
Ms Varsha Khajanchi, Manav Rachna International School, Faridabad

papers.title: CBSE Question Papers & Sample Papers

testimonials.booksTitle: Testimonials – Text Books on Business Studies
testimonials.booksSubtitle: What teachers and students say about the core Business Studies textbooks.

booksItems.name: Ms Santvana Charuvedi
booksItems.message: Hearty congratulations Mahajan Sirji. You are a very dedicated, hardworking, caring and focused author who takes care of all aspects and current updates. Perfection is one word that defines your work. I feel blessed to be associated with you and foresee many more such moments of pride and honour.

booksItems.name: Mr Rajesh Kumar
booksItems.role: SB Vidyalaya, Pitam Pura, New Delhi
booksItems.message: I have received specimen copy of Business Studies by R.K. Mahajan Sir and gone through it. Excellent book in all aspects. 5* for Mahajan Sir. Please bring Hindi medium also so that students of government schools can get the benefit of your hard work.

booksItems.name: Dr Vikas Vijay
booksItems.role: Formerly PGT (Commerce), New Era Public School, Maya Puri, New Delhi
booksItems.message: I know Mr Rajesh Kumar Mahajan from last five years. He has a different fire and spark. Apart from having an ace command over the subject he is an emotional, honest and sincere person. His Business Studies book is a master stroke – teacher-student friendly, with strong content and style of writing.

booksItems.name: Mr Piyush R. Mehta
booksItems.message: Your Business Studies books for Classes XI and XII appealed to me a lot. Simple language and use of pictures at various places make topics interesting and easy to understand. You have made right use of the maxim ‘A picture is worth a thousand words’.

booksItems.name: Ms Surabhi Sinha
booksItems.role: PGT (Commerce), Mother’s Global School, Preet Vihar, New Delhi
booksItems.message: Your books are complete in all aspects – good for both teachers and students. Lessons are planned in a very systematic way. Presentation is very good, simple language, no unnecessary explanation, systematic progress, that is from basic concepts to the depth of the subject matter. It's good that NCERT questions are also considered with answers. I really appreciate your efforts.

booksItems.name: Ms Arti Chopra
booksItems.role: PGT (Commerce), Ryan International School, Mayur Vihar, New Delhi
booksItems.message: I wholeheartedly congratulate Mr Rajesh Kumar Mahajan for Business Studies books which present various concepts in simplified manner with day-to-day examples. Content is sufficient, questions and suggested answers are appreciable and especially helpful for government school students where language is a barrier.

booksItems.name: Ms Madhumita Saha
booksItems.message: The books cover all topics in a clear and structured manner with a good range of question typologies. They are extremely helpful for classroom teaching as well as exam preparation and will soon become best sellers among Business Studies resources.

testimonials.otqTitle: Testimonials – Objective Type Questions on Business Studies (OTQ Book)
testimonials.otqSubtitle: Feedback specifically for the ‘Objective Type Questions on Business Studies – Class XII’ book.

otqItems.name: Leena Arora
otqItems.role: DAV Ashok Vihar, New Delhi
otqItems.message: This book shows how you have made things easier for students in Business Studies. Your resolute efforts call for great appreciation. You are a true educationist, sir. Hats off to your spirit.

otqItems.name: Suman Khanna
otqItems.role: HOD Commerce, Ramjas School R.K. Puram, New Delhi
otqItems.message: Received the specimen copy of your book on OTQs and found it immensely useful for students. It will enhance the speed of answering OTQs and help them score more than 20 marks. Recommended to my students and in the official book list – a very good purchase for concept building, clarity and revision.

otqItems.name: Ms Meenakshi Deewan
otqItems.role: Ramjas School, Pusa Road, New Delhi
otqItems.message: I have gone through the OTQs, Sir your hard work and efforts in preparing these questions are commendable. Each and every concept is covered and cases used to put questions are very relatable. A complete material on which we can blindly rely for board preparation. In the next session, we are planning to add this book in our book list. Thanks for sharing your knowledge with us and our students.

otqItems.name: Ms Mamta Srivastava PGT (Commerce)
otqItems.role: Delhi Public School, Mathura Road, New Delhi
otqItems.message: This book is just what I was looking for. A great way to quickly understand and comprehend Class XII Business Studies syllabus. The book covers each chapter in such a detailed and easy manner that a reader can understand the whole chapter firstly from this book and then can do revision from NCERT. Hats off for such an elaborate coverage of content.

otqItems.name: Ms Neena Batra
otqItems.role: DAV School, Amritsar, Punjab
otqItems.message: OTQs on Business Studies cover all types of questions chapter-wise according to NCERT syllabus and help students revise full syllabus. By doing these, students can score full marks in board exams. All teachers should recommend this book.

otqItems.name: Ms Sangeeta Vashisth
otqItems.role: HOD Commerce, The Mann School, New Delhi
otqItems.message: The book is wonderful because one-word answer questions, based on case studies, prepare a child not only for the concept clarity in short answers but even for long answer questions as well. Mostly, children identify wrong concepts, and hence remaining answers also go wrong, that weak area is also covered by you.

otqItems.name: Ms Meenakshi Mishra
otqItems.role: HOD Business Studies Department, Vivekanand School, New Delhi
otqItems.message: The book completely covers revision of all aspects and weak areas of every chapter. A vast collection of case studies enables concept clarity – making the mission of scoring 95+ achievable.

otqItems.name: Anjali
otqItems.role: Air Force Bal Bharti, Lodhi Road, New Delhi
otqItems.message: All the questions are very conceptual and require proper thinking. Some are linked with current market situations. Answers of reason-based questions are given with full clarity.

otqItems.name: Bela Sharma
otqItems.role: Army Public School, Shankar Vihar, New Delhi
otqItems.message: It’s an amazing effort. Quality and content will really benefit everyone as all aspects of the chapters are covered from every possible angle.

otqItems.name: Deepali Gupta
otqItems.role: Queen Mary’s School, New Delhi
otqItems.message: Quality of questions is commendable; they relate theoretical concepts with real-life situations. Proper explanation with correct reasoning makes this a complete list of OTQs.

otqItems.name: Mamta Narula
otqItems.role: PGT (Commerce) Delhi Public School, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi
otqItems.message: I really liked the way Objective type questions are framed and arranged in this book. This book provides comprehensive coverage of the different types of objective type questions and will be useful to students for preparing them for board exams. I appreciate the hard work and creativity in bringing such quality material for all.

otqItems.name: Mridula Chawla
otqItems.role: Shivvani Model Sr. Sec School, Dwarka, New Delhi
otqItems.message: Your focused approach and analysis of OTQ Business studies is refreshing and ignites the mind of students to sharpen their analytical skills. All questions are competency-based which give, not only to students but also to teachers, a new perspective towards overall development with different dimensions. This book is a complete package in itself and the students may not require any additional study material.

otqItems.name: Ms Divya Aggarwal
otqItems.role: Bal Bharti Public School Rohini, New Delhi
otqItems.message: The OTQ book of Mahajan Sir is a very well planned, researched based book having a variety of questions from each chapter. It would really be a great source for the students to prepare for the board exam. It has a wide array of questions which would satisfy the learning desire and curiosity of the students.

otqItems.name: Varsha Khajanchi
otqItems.role: PGT Commerce, Manav Rachna International School, Charmwood, Faridabad, Haryana
otqItems.message: Mr R. K. Mahajan has put down a very comprehensive question bank with a superlative quality not seen in the market yet. His work is student-focused, detailed oriented, and result-driven which completely ensures learning to the student. My expectations have been exceeded time and again by the quality of work that he puts in keeping in mind different types of learners and their learning needs. Dynamism in his work is clearly visible according to the learning environment and examination pattern. I extend my heartiest congratulations to him for producing such quality work with his constant zeal to do the best in student’s interest.

otqItems.name: Parul Jain
otqItems.role: H.O.D. (Commerce), Navy Children School, Chanakya Puri, New Delhi
otqItems.message: This book contains a plethora of questions on each topic. These questions have been prepared with extensive research, hard work and reasoning. The author has applied his intellect, knowledge and wide experience in preparing a Kaleidoscope of questions, which is as per the latest pattern of CBSE board papers. It provides the students with comprehensive and in-depth knowledge of concepts and fully prepares them for the Board exams. The new feature added to the book is 'Correct the Incorrect statement' - An innovative approach by the author.

otqItems.name: Priyanka Jain
otqItems.role: Amity International School Sector 46, Haryana
otqItems.message: A comprehensive and relevant collection of objective type of questions. Each topic has been analysed carefully. Answers to all questions without any ambiguity are highly appreciated. This effort of yours will certainly help students to prepare well for their exams.

otqItems.name: Manju Nawani
otqItems.role: Air Force Golden Jubilee Institute, Subroto Park, New Delhi
otqItems.message: OTQ Book on Business Studies, It indeed reflects a lot of thought process, hard work and it depicts a good vision about all the aspects of about CBSE business studies paper. I have recommended the same to my students also.

otqItems.name: Roopali Trehan Ahuja
otqItems.role: PGT Commerce, Bhatnagar International School, Paschim Vihar, New Delhi
otqItems.message: A thorough review of the book reveals that all the questions have been framed very carefully and with complete clarity of concepts. The way some of them have been related to the present scenario is highly appreciated. I have recommended this book to students, as it covers all the important concepts of the subject. It will not only prepare them for their forthcoming board exams but also give them an insight into the knowledge they have gained.

otqItems.name: Sandhya Wadhwa
otqItems.role: PGT Commerce, Ramjas Public School (Day Boarding)
otqItems.message: An excellent approach to objective type questions. The best part of the book is that it contains questions regarding conceptual clarity as well as real-life situations. I am sure that it will help students in achieving proficiency and clarity while attempting objective type questions. This book will fulfil all the subject related needs of the children. Great work done!

otqItems.name: Shalini Arora
otqItems.role: HOD Commerce, GLT Saraswati Bal Mandir, Nehru Nagar, New Delhi
otqItems.message: Mr R. K. Mahajan who is a known academician authority in the field of Business Studies, has successfully authored a new book on the subject and in the MCQ format. The reading is lucid and probes the student to study in a smooth way. The subject is covered from end to end in a progressive manner so that the understanding goes up steeply when all MCQs are attempted by the student.

otqItems.name: Ms Mridu Mehra
otqItems.role: New Era Public School, Mayapuri, New Delhi
otqItems.message: This book by far has the most comprehensive collection of all possible types of OTQs ranging from MCQs, Fill in the blanks, one word answers, True/false, correct the incorrect statement, etc. It even has picture identification and assertion based questions which I personally haven’t come across in any other reference book. It is a complete help book in the true sense. Will definitely recommend it to my students!

otqItems.name: Ms Manjula Mehta
otqItems.role: Vidya Bhawan Mahavidyalaya, Lodi Road, New Delhi
otqItems.message: Mahajan Sir, your work is a well-organized, carefully prepared volume, which covers all conceivable aspects of Business Studies. The vast amount of questions have covered even the minute details of a chapter. The Book has the latest CBSE Curriculum and the latest Typology of Questions which makes it helpful for students.
